problem_text_cn: 如图,霍邱县政府准备修建一座高AB=6m的过街天桥．已知天桥的坡面AC与地面BC的夹角为∠ACB,且sin∠ACB=\frac{3}{5}．则坡面的AC的长度为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the government of Huoqiu County plans to build a overpass with height AB = N_0. It is known that the angle between the slope AC of the overpass and the ground BC is ∠ACB, and sin∠ACB=\frac{N_1}{N_2}. Then the length of the slope AC is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵天桥的坡面AC与地面BC的夹角为∠ACB,且sin∠ACB=\frac{3}{5},AB=6m,∴sin∠ACB=\frac{AB}{AC}=\frac{3}{5}=\frac{6}{AC},解得；AC=10,故选:B．
